response.body:
{
    "domain": "request_logs",
    "currentPage": 1,
    "pageSize": 10,
    "totalCount": 0,
    "records": [
        {
            "request_id": 3,
            "app_code": 201,
            "app_name": "MEMBERS PORTAL",
            "request_reference": "f57c8495-dcd2-11ec-a62f-00505628d96b-2",
            "request_method": "POST",
            "request_resource": "/resource/uri",
            "request_parameters": "appCode=101&filter=NONE",
            "request_headers": "Authorization: Bearer Token",
            "request_body": "Create & Set up Database for Gibbon
       - CREATE DATABASE mcec_portal_db;
       - CREATE USER 'mcec_portal'@'192.168.140.142' IDENTIFIED BY 'MC3C#P02t4l@22!';
       - GRANT ALL ON mcec_portal_db.* TO 'mcec_portal'@'192.168.140.142';
       - FLUSH PRIVILEGES;",
            "request_origin_ip": "192.168.2.128",
            "request_status": "ERROR",
            "response_headers": "Authorization: Bearer Token",
            "response_body": "<VirtualHost *:80>
    #ServerName example.com
    #ServerAlias www.example.com
    DocumentRoot /var/www/applications/gibbon-edu-core-v23.0.02

    <Directory /var/www/applications/gibbon-edu-core-v23.0.02>
	Options -Indexes +FollowSymLinks +MultiViews
	AllowOverride All
	Require all granted
    </Directory>

    <FilesMatch \.php$>
	SetHandler "proxy:unix:/var/run/php/php8.0-fpm.sock|fcgi://localhost"
    </FilesMatch>

    ErrorLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/gibbon-error.log
    CustomLog ${APACHE_LOG_DIR}/gibbon-access.log combined

</VirtualHost>",
            "error_code": "E1005",
            "error_message": "Error Processing Request",
            "error_stacktrace": "sudo vi /etc/php/8.0/fpm/php.ini
   		- memory_limit = 512M
   		- date.timezone = Africa/Nairobi
   		- max_file_uploads = 100
   		- magic_quotes_gpc = Off
   		- register_globals = Off
   		- short_open_tag = On
   		- allow_url_fopen = On
   		- max_input_vars = 10000
       - sudo systemctl restart php8.0-fpm",
            "date_created": "2022-05-26 12:09:17",
            "date_modified": "2022-05-26 12:09:17"
        }
    ]
}
